SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT RESER_NO, MEM_ID, RESER_NAME, MEM_PHONE, TO_CHAR(CHECKIN_TIME ,'YYYY.MM.DD') "CHECKIN_TIME" FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (MEM_NO = RE_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY RESER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_PATH, TO_CHAR(RESER_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD')"RESER_DATE", TO_CHAR(TB_RESERVATION.CHECKIN_TIME,'YYYY.MM.DD') "CHECKIN_TIME", TO_CHAR(TB_RESERVATION.CHECKOUT_TIME,'YYYY.MM.DD')"CHECKOUT_TIME", BICYCLE, PEOPLE, PAYMENT, PAYMENT_PRICE FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_ROOM ON (TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO) JOIN TB_HOTEL ON (TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO) JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (RE_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND RESER_NO = ? GROUP BY HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_PATH, RESER_DATE, TB_RESERVATION.CHECKIN_TIME, TB_RESERVATION.CHECKOUT_TIME, BICYCLE, PEOPLE, PAYMENT, PAYMENT_PRICE
UPDATE TB_RESERVATION SET CANCEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE RESER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (RE_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT RESER_NO, RESER_NAME, MEM_PHONE, TO_CHAR(CHECKIN_TIME ,'YYYY.MM.DD') "CHECKIN_TIME"
FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (MEM_NO = RE_MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'N' AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY RESER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT RESER_NO, MEM_ID, RESER_NAME, MEM_PHONE, TO_CHAR(CHECKIN_TIME ,'YYYY.MM.DD') "CHECKIN_TIME" FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (MEM_NO = RE_MEM_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(TB_NONMEM.MEM_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND MEM_ID = ? ORDER BY RESER_NO DESC

SELECT RESER_NO, RESER_NAME, MEM_PHONE, TO_CHAR(CHECKIN_TIME ,'YYYY.MM.DD') "CHECKIN_TIME"
FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (MEM_NO = RE_MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_STATUS = 'N' AND CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND RESER_NAME = ? ORDER BY RESER_NO DESC
SELECT RESER_NO, RESER_NAME, MEM_PHONE FROM( SELECT RESER_NO, RESER_NAME, MEM_PHONE FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_NONMEM ON (MEM_NO = RE_MEM_NO) ORDER BY RESER_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(RESER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND CANCEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_PRICE) FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(RESER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
